com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events

Class SoaMusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events.SoaMusicPlayer

  • public class SoaMusicPlayer
extends Object
    The SoaMusicPlayer is a slightly modified version of the implementation example of the lavaplayer library which can be found on Github: https://github.com/sedmelluq/lavaplayer

    NOTE: The commands in this class are only permitted to be run by:

    • Eldars
    • Lians
    • Anyone temporarily assigned the role of "DJ"

      • getGuildAudioPlayer

        private GuildMusicManager getGuildAudioPlayer(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IGuild guild)
        Get the GuildMusicManager for the provided guild. If one does not exist, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        guild - The guild for which a music manager will be retrieved
        Returns:
        The music manager for the guild

      • checkMusicRoles

        private boolean checkMusicRoles(sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        Checks to determine if the person who has issued a music command is permitted to run the MusicPlayer
        Parameters:
        event - MessageReceivedEvent
        Returns:
        true if user is allowed to issue these commands, false otherwise

      • handleMusicArgs

        public void handleMusicArgs(sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.MessageReceivedEvent event,
                            String[] args)
                     throws sx.blah.discord.util.MissingPermissionsException,
                            sx.blah.discord.util.RateLimitException,
                            sx.blah.discord.util.DiscordException
        Handles the arguments sent to the MusicPlayer.
        Parameters:
        event - MessageReceivedEvent
        args - The additional arguments other than ".music" sent to the bot.
        Throws:
        sx.blah.discord.util.MissingPermissionsException - Thrown if the bot doesn't have permission to take the desired action
        sx.blah.discord.util.RateLimitException - Thrown if the bot has reached the rate limit
        sx.blah.discord.util.DiscordException - Thrown if any other generic Discord error has occurred.
